/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape.

In the foreground, a construction site is visible, marked off by a blue fence. A crane stands tall, hinting at the ongoing development in the city. Beyond the construction site, the cityscape unfolds with several high-rise buildings piercing the skyline. These structures exhibit a mix of architectural styles, suggesting a blend of modern and traditional influences.

The street itself is lined with trees, adding a touch of green to the otherwise concrete jungle. Vehicles, including cars and buses, traverse the road, indicative of the city's active life. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, further enhancing the lively atmosphere of the scene.
